com.visualon.OSMPHDMICheck
Interface voOSHDMIStateCheck.onHDMIStateChangeListener

Enclosing class:
voOSHDMIStateCheck
public static interface voOSHDMIStateCheck.onHDMIStateChangeListener

set hdmi state change event listener

Event: 

 HDMISTATE_INITED = 0x800;
 HDMISTATE_CONNECT = 1;
 HDMISTATE_DISCONNECT = 0;

Method Summary
 void onHDMIStateChangeEvent(int nID, java.lang.Object nObj)
          HDMI state change event listener
 

Method Detail

onHDMIStateChangeEvent

void onHDMIStateChangeEvent(int nID,
                            java.lang.Object nObj)
HDMI state change event listener

Parameters:
nID - Event type 
 HDMISTATE_INITED
        Call isHDMIConnected() function to get HDMI state after receive this msg
        nObj is Integer type, value is:
                0-disconnect;
                1-connect;

 HDMISTATE_CONNECT
 express  HDMI connect
 HDMISTATE_DISCONNECT
 express  HDMI disconnect
nObj - Event value,
